rules_text:
When Festival Vessel enters the battlefield or attacks, scry 1, then create a Treasure token and a Food token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
